Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that President Trump issued a pardon for the leader of the armed group. (biased claim)
Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates the severity of the situation by stating that the armed group held migrants at gunpoint, when in reality, it was a false report. (biased claim)
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as it is based on a fake news article from a junk news site impersonating NBC News. (biased claim)
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that President Trump would issue a pardon for the leader of an armed group without any evidence or official confirmation. (biased claim)
Exist alternative explanation: The claim does not provide any alternative explanation or consider other possibilities for the reported incident. (biased claim)
